As the snow piles up in State College downtown parking woes are also on the rise PERIOD

State College has seen about  inches of snow in January and AccuWeather senior meteorologist Paul Pastelok expected  or  more by this morning PERIOD

This means State College Borough is officially in a snow emergency PERIOD

A snow emergency is declared when snowfall exceeds  inches public works director Mark Whitfield said PERIOD During a snow emergency all parking on State College streets is prohibited PERIOD

Those who continue to park on the street during a snow emergency will be towed Whitfield said PERIOD State College Police Department Cpl PERIOD Mark Argiro said  cars were towed between  a.m PERIOD Monday and  a.m PERIOD yesterday PERIOD More than  cars were towed during last weeks snowstorm Argiro said PERIOD

The parking prohibition extends even to cars with residential parking permits State College Health Department Secretary Sharon Ergler said PERIOD Drivers are also asked not to park in metered lots downtown after midnight so that snow can be removed from the lots Ergler said PERIOD

To determine if a snow emergency has been declared Ergler said drivers can check with local news media outlets especially television stations that scroll snowrelated information on the bottom of the screen PERIOD Drivers can also call the State College Public Works Department or the State College Police Departments nonemergency line Ergler said PERIOD

Instead of parking on the streets drivers are encouraged to park in borough garages and private lots Ergler said PERIOD Another option is to take public transportation Ergler said PERIOD

Though Whitfield said the public works department would rather not tow vehicles doing so is necessary for streets to be adequately cleared PERIOD Not clearing areas where vehicles usually park prevents the loss of those spots and the narrowing of borough streets PERIOD

 Whitfield said PERIOD 

Whitfield said that during a snowstorm public works crews focus on clearing main roads such as College and Beaver Avenues and Atherton Street PERIOD After the snow has stopped crews then work to plow residential areas PERIOD

During a snow emergency  to  public works employees are assigned to snow removal PERIOD To clear snow Whitfield said plows push the snow to the side of the street before snow blower crews remove the snow from the street PERIOD

Snowfall affects oncampus parking as well PERIOD

Doug Holmes assistant director for parking at Penn State said Penn State refers to snow emergencies as  When a midnight clear is in effect parking is prohibited in any  parking lot or the roof level of any parking garage between midnight and  a.m. Holmes said PERIOD A surface parking lot is one that is not enclosed PERIOD

Student storage lots such as Lot  are not included in midnight clear prohibitions Holmes said PERIOD

 Holmes said PERIOD

Drivers who need to be on campus at night including graduate students doing overnight research can park in oncampus parking garages after  p.m PERIOD if they have a campus parking pass Holmes said PERIOD
